results.title: Balloon angioplasty for native aortic coarctation in different anatomic variants.
results.text_hl: The other four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ continued to have mild gradient (20-22 mmHg) with @DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ and without angiographic evidence of @DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ but with @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Nerve_Hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080344 @@@isthmus hypoplasia@@@; they received @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Massoud Iel S, Farghly HE, Abdul-Monem A, Botros N, Kassem A, Magraby AE, Dawood A, Abdul-Hakam M. Balloon angioplasty for native aortic coarctation in different anatomic variants. Pediatr Cardiol. 2008 May;29(3):521-9. PMID: 18043860
